title: Mr. Daniel's Hypnosis Study collection
description:
This is a collection of mostly SWF files from the
defunct site www.mrdanielshypnosis.com.  The files in
the folder "castle" were supposedly for site
subscribers only, while those in the top level
folder were free loss leaders.  In general, the
content of the castle files was supposed to be
more intense.

Frankly, I'm not a fan.  Mr. Daniels technique was
to produce insanely long repetitive flash files
with dozens of countdowns and content sequences
that advanced at a glacial pace.  I have read
that some of the files run for six hours or more,
but have not had the patience to see for myself.
On the other hand, some people swear by his methods.

Mr. Daniels always claimed his followers were genetic
women whom he was brainwashing into bimbos.  I suspect
there were as many, or more, men into feminization
who joined the site.

In general a flash file can be played in your web
browser, or with Adobe's standalone flash player.
However some of these files are node locked, and
check whether they are being loaded from
www.mrdanielshypnosis.com before they will run.
I got around this by creating a dummy web server
and adding that hostname to the "localhost"
entry in the host files.  Other people have said
it is possible to edit the flash files to unlock
them, but I don't know the tools and methods
used for that.  You may want to run the files
on a machine without an internet connection as
some of them call out to youtube and other sites
in a really anoying way
